snippet: Hawk Cam 2012: On Saturday afternoon, the baby hawk was still tethered to a plastic bag, but experts will wait before intervening on the nest.
abstract: Hawk Cam 2012: On Saturday afternoon, the baby hawk was still tethered to a plastic bag, but experts will wait before intervening on the nest.

headline.main: Plan for the Tangled Baby Hawk Is to Wait and See, for Now
